name: Armazone
description:
Armazone is a 2D top-down shooter where you are a Brazilian macaw trying to save the forest from the fires.

Put out the fire spots with your water gun, while you shoot oranges at enemy aircrafts that will try to stop you!

Defeat the final boss and save the forest!

This game was design as a prototype for the discipline "Programming for 2D Games", from the Game Design  program at Universidade Anhembi Morumbi (São Paulo/SP).

This project is available for download, we'd love to hear your feedback, and maybe create a bigger (and better!) game out of it.

Made with Unity.
